name: Sheep Dreams
description:
"Sheep Dreams" is a game where you control a sleepy sheep and jump over fences to gain points. How far can you get? Use the Spacebar key to jump! (The W key and the Up arrow key work too, if you prefer.)

This is my first time developing a game solo, so unfortunately there is no saving system or settings menu available as I wanted to keep it simple.

Additional credits:
Background Music Track "Beautiful Morning Loop 1" by https://www.fiftysounds.com
Sheep sound effect by https://quicksounds.com
